citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 5:00 - 5:30pm on
4/30/2024. Inspector knocked on doors and waited 30 min. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records
for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 5:00 - 5:30pm on 
4/30/2024. Inspector knocked on doors and waited 30 min. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records 
for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
